$interpreted: Angelia: Elio Carlos, your crime of betraying the Kingdom is a capital offense.
Angelia: But after considering your contributions in the Desert Kingdom, and given that the Academy's former Headmaster, Charle Ceres, vouches for you...
Angelia: With the Sun and the Twelve Nobles as my witness—
Angelia: I shall hold off on the death penalty, but will strip you of the Carlos name.
Angelia: From this day on, you are permitted to interact only among the people and the academic world. If this is violated, you will not be forgiven.
Elio: Highest Sun, I solemnly obey your command.
Angelia: That is all. You may leave.
Elio: ...Your Majesty, the Queen, take care...
Angelia: (...I hope the Sun guides you, Elio.)
Naya: Congrats, Angel~
Naya: That huge burden has finally been lifted.
Angelia: Yeah...
Naya: So you really are concerned about what Elio's going to do from now on?
Angelia: ......
Angelia: ...I mean, Uncle...Theodore, who knows where he is.
Angelia: They are father and son after all.
Naya: Angel, you...could it be that you're thinking...
Charle: Okay, that's the last part~
Aosta: That should be it for transcribing all the documents that were burned in the Library of Forbidden Texts.
Aosta: ...Never thought you actually had committed them all to memory.
Charle: Thanks to your help, everything went smoothly.
Charle: The intel that Morris gathered on the Dracontines, if it wasn't for you relaying it, everything would have been in vain...
Aosta: ...Professor must have anticipated the risk, so he took me with him and let me hear everything that was said.
Aosta: To prepare...for when it was needed.
Aosta: I merely wish to fulfill the professor's wishes, it has nothing to do with you.
Charle: Even though that's the case, it's because we provided these records that the queen was willing to grant Elio amnesty.
Charle: ...So thank you, truly.
Aosta: I'll get to moving. Remaining here, can't guarantee that I won't run into students. Plus, Balzac surely won't stop running her mouth to me.
Charle: Tell her I hope she gets better soon. The former headmaster can't keep helping her take care of the Academy's affairs.
Aosta: ...I'll relay the message.
Charle: ——Clovis.
Charle: I've seen your research on Crystals. Morris was right. Your talent is an indispensable part of this new era of Life Magic .
Charle: Would you be willing to return to the Academy and continue Morris' research?
Aosta: No one can replace Professor.
Charle: I see...
Aosta: But I'll consider it.
Charle: ...If Morris heard that, he'd certainly be pleased.
Aosta: ......
Charle: Elio, you've returned?
Elio: I've returned...Father.
Charle: How was Angelia the Queen's attitude? Did she make things difficult?
Elio: ...Um, it was alright. I think she did her best.
Elio: Father!? Why so sudden...
Charle: You're right. It was no one's fault. Both of you tried your hardest.
Charle: I know it was hard, my son.
Elio: ...Father...
Elio: ...I...I was waiting for you to say that...
Elio: Really...I've waited so long...
Elio: ...*sob*...*sob*...*sob*...
Charle: Elio...I'm sorry. Please forgive me, I'm not worthy to be a father...
Tica: Eyyyy-ya!? Wazz up, waz up? Am I interrupting you two?
Tica: Okay, okay. I'll step out for five minutes, then come back~
Elio: No worries, come on in!
Tica: Oh, but your eyes are all red and stuff...
Elio: S-Some dust got rubbed in my eyes, what brings you?
Tica: Oh ya? Tica doesn't think so. More like you were crying...I teased Annie before and she also——
Charle: ...Tica, what is it?
Tica: Ah, oh yeah!
Tica: Actually, Li-Hwa wanted me to come here to get things moving~
Tica: Elio coming to the Kingdom of the Sun kind of delayed the schedule. We've got to head out~
Charle: That quick? But...
Elio: Father, is there something on your mind?
Charle: It's nothing.
Charle: I'm just worried you may be exhausted.
Charle: Sending you two to the East Alliance to study the relationship between Qi and Runes with Li-Hwa...
Charle: Although it was at the request of Li-Hwa, it is also for the Rune Academy.
Tica: For the Rune Academy?
Charle: The Dracontines have already proved there remain many enigmas concerning runes that we were unaware of.
Charle: If we are to protect ourselves, we need the power to contend against them.
Charle: I'm already old——the future of the Rune Academy is in your hands.
Tica: Mission received!
Tica: Tica is an errand expert, not a problem at all!
Elio: For the Academy...I will give it everything I have.
Charle: Good answer, now get going.
Elio: ...If I return, and I mean "if", Father...if you're not opposed to it...
Charle: ..If I'm not opposed?
Elio: I'd like to remain by my father's side and do research with you!
Elio: ......M-May I?
Charle: ......
Charle: Of course! So long as that's what you really want. I've always wanted to do research with you~
Elio: ......Me too!
Elio: There's still so much I want to say to you——
Tica: Elio, time to go~ Didn't you say when we got to the Desert Kingdom you needed to tell your friends you were safe?
Tica: ...Oooooh! Who would've thought I'd be the one doing the lecturing~
Charle: ...Tell me when you return, I'll listen to it all. Time to go.
Elio: Okay. Well then, I, Elio Ceres, shall take my leave, Father. I'll bring you back a bunch of souvenirs.
Charle: Via Soul.
Tica: Did I hear you say you wanted to buy souveniers?
Tica: Then I'll buy some Eastern spices to give to Headmaster Ceres. Maybe that'll inspire him to create a new recipe...
Elio: ...For the sake of the health of all the students and teachers in the Academy, it looks like there's no way I can let you touch our funds.
Charle: (...It's up to you two...the two children I am most proud of...)
Charle: Indeed, just like you said.
Charle: Everything that should be written...is nearly finished...
Charle: Ah, now I remember.
Charle: Always dragging Morris out the door to look for research materials...
Charle: Ah-ya, a clear and endless sky~
Charle: I must go find my good friend Morris. Let's go, Owl Boy.
Ace: ...Monsters and the resurrection of Sdorica are related? Is this real?
Angelia: This was intel gathered by the Rune Academy with blood and tears. I believe it is true.
Ace: ...I see. Well, let's assume it is true for the time being.
Ace: May I ask if this has anything to do with why Your Majesty sent all the people away and summoned me?
Angelia: ......
Ace: ...Your Majesty?
Angelia: ...Besides the Aldric family, I don't know who I can trust among the Twelve Nobles.
Ace: Your Majesty, you don't suspect that among the Twelve Nobles, there are some that are working with the Dracontines...?
Angelia: I don't suspect it, I firmly believe it.
Angelia: Now that I think of it, Theodore must have known. That would explain a lot of his actions when he was Regent.
Angelia: ...It's just he never let me know...
Ace: Besides this, is there any more information?
Angelia: There is some concerning the inner workings of the Dracontine organization. The Academy has organized it for me. I will give it to you in due time.
Angelia: But before then, I'd like to ask your opinion on something.
Ace: Please, Your Majesty.
Angelia: The woman who charged into the Rune Academy was captured by our troops. She was brought back to the Kingdom and secretly locked up.
Angelia: Duke Aldric, how do you think we should deal with her?
Ace: I think...
Naya: Angel, Master Ace. Apologies for disturbing your discussion.
Angelia: Naya? What is it?
Naya: It was sent from the East Alliance. An invitation to the Martial Arts Tourney.

Naya: Before, you had left the palace, and the ambassador came many times, saying he couldn't find you.
 
This time, he was emphatic it be given to you directly.
Angelia: ...Oh, I'm sorry...
Naya: But when you were meeting with Master Ace, it was ordered that no one is allowed to enter. I offered to take it to you on behalf of the soldier.
Angelia: Okay, thank you. Let me see.
Angelia: Oh, dropped it!
Ace: Your Majesty, wait——

Model.Text: Elio Carlos, your crime of betraying the Kingdom is a capital offense.
But after considering your contributions in the Desert Kingdom, and given that the Academy's former Headmaster, Charle Ceres, vouches for you...
With the Sun and the Twelve Nobles as my witness—
I shall hold off on the death penalty, but will strip you of the Carlos name.
From this day on, you are permitted to interact only among the people and the academic world. If this is violated, you will not be forgiven.
Highest Sun, I solemnly obey your command.
That is all. You may leave.
...Your Majesty, the Queen, take care...
(...I hope the Sun guides you, Elio.)
Congrats, Angel~
That huge burden has finally been lifted.
Yeah...
So you really are concerned about what Elio's going to do from now on?
...I mean, Uncle...Theodore, who knows where he is.
They are father and son after all.
Angel, you...could it be that you're thinking...
Okay, that's the last part~
That should be it for transcribing all the documents that were burned in the Library of Forbidden Texts.
...Never thought you actually had committed them all to memory.
Thanks to your help, everything went smoothly.
The intel that Morris gathered on the Dracontines, if it wasn't for you relaying it, everything would have been in vain...
...Professor must have anticipated the risk, so he took me with him and let me hear everything that was said.
To prepare...for when it was needed.
I merely wish to fulfill the professor's wishes, it has nothing to do with you.
Even though that's the case, it's because we provided these records that the queen was willing to grant Elio amnesty.
...So thank you, truly.
I'll get to moving. Remaining here, can't guarantee that I won't run into students. Plus, Balzac surely won't stop running her mouth to me.
Tell her I hope she gets better soon. The former headmaster can't keep helping her take care of the Academy's affairs.
...I'll relay the message.
——Clovis.
I've seen your research on Crystals. Morris was right. Your talent is an indispensable part of this new era of Life Magic .
Would you be willing to return to the Academy and continue Morris' research?
No one can replace Professor.
I see...
But I'll consider it.
...If Morris heard that, he'd certainly be pleased.
Elio, you've returned?
I've returned...Father.
How was Angelia the Queen's attitude? Did she make things difficult?
...Um, it was alright. I think she did her best.
Father!? Why so sudden...
You're right. It was no one's fault. Both of you tried your hardest.
I know it was hard, my son.
...Father...
...I...I was waiting for you to say that...
Really...I've waited so long...
Elio...I'm sorry. Please forgive me, I'm not worthy to be a father...
Eyyyy-ya!? Wazz up, waz up? Am I interrupting you two?
Okay, okay. I'll step out for five minutes, then come back~
No worries, come on in!
Oh, but your eyes are all red and stuff...
S-Some dust got rubbed in my eyes, what brings you?
Oh ya? Tica doesn't think so. More like you were crying...I teased Annie before and she also——
...Tica, what is it?
Ah, oh yeah!
Actually, Li-Hwa wanted me to come here to get things moving~
Elio coming to the Kingdom of the Sun kind of delayed the schedule. We've got to head out~
That quick? But...
Father, is there something on your mind?
It's nothing.
I'm just worried you may be exhausted.
Sending you two to the East Alliance to study the relationship between Qi and Runes with Li-Hwa...
Although it was at the request of Li-Hwa, it is also for the Rune Academy.
For the Rune Academy?
The Dracontines have already proved there remain many enigmas concerning runes that we were unaware of.
If we are to protect ourselves, we need the power to contend against them.
I'm already old——the future of the Rune Academy is in your hands.
Mission received!
Tica is an errand expert, not a problem at all!
For the Academy...I will give it everything I have.
Good answer, now get going.
...If I return, and I mean "if", Father...if you're not opposed to it...
..If I'm not opposed?
I'd like to remain by my father's side and do research with you!
Of course! So long as that's what you really want. I've always wanted to do research with you~
......Me too!
There's still so much I want to say to you——
Elio, time to go~ Didn't you say when we got to the Desert Kingdom you needed to tell your friends you were safe?
...Oooooh! Who would've thought I'd be the one doing the lecturing~
...Tell me when you return, I'll listen to it all. Time to go.
Okay. Well then, I, Elio Ceres, shall take my leave, Father. I'll bring you back a bunch of souvenirs.
Via Soul.
Did I hear you say you wanted to buy souveniers?
Then I'll buy some Eastern spices to give to Headmaster Ceres. Maybe that'll inspire him to create a new recipe...
...For the sake of the health of all the students and teachers in the Academy, it looks like there's no way I can let you touch our funds.
(...It's up to you two...the two children I am most proud of...)
Indeed, just like you said.
Everything that should be written...is nearly finished...
Ah, now I remember.
Always dragging Morris out the door to look for research materials...
Ah-ya, a clear and endless sky~
I must go find my good friend Morris. Let's go, Owl Boy.
...Monsters and the resurrection of Sdorica are related? Is this real?
This was intel gathered by the Rune Academy with blood and tears. I believe it is true.
...I see. Well, let's assume it is true for the time being.
May I ask if this has anything to do with why Your Majesty sent all the people away and summoned me?
...Your Majesty?
...Besides the Aldric family, I don't know who I can trust among the Twelve Nobles.
Your Majesty, you don't suspect that among the Twelve Nobles, there are some that are working with the Dracontines...?
I don't suspect it, I firmly believe it.
Now that I think of it, Theodore must have known. That would explain a lot of his actions when he was Regent.
...It's just he never let me know...
Besides this, is there any more information?
There is some concerning the inner workings of the Dracontine organization. The Academy has organized it for me. I will give it to you in due time.
But before then, I'd like to ask your opinion on something.
Please, Your Majesty.
The woman who charged into the Rune Academy was captured by our troops. She was brought back to the Kingdom and secretly locked up.
Duke Aldric, how do you think we should deal with her?
I think...
Angel, Master Ace. Apologies for disturbing your discussion.
Naya? What is it?
It was sent from the East Alliance. An invitation to the Martial Arts Tourney.

Before, you had left the palace, and the ambassador came many times, saying he couldn't find you.
 
This time, he was emphatic it be given to you directly.
...Oh, I'm sorry...
But when you were meeting with Master Ace, it was ordered that no one is allowed to enter. I offered to take it to you on behalf of the soldier.
Okay, thank you. Let me see.
Oh, dropped it!
Your Majesty, wait——

returned...Father.","sfxName":"h0133_story_024_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_17_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"How was Angelia the Queen's attitude? Did she make things difficult?","sfxName":"h0025_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_17_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp2_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Um, it was alright. I think she did her best.","sfxName":"h0133_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_18_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Father!? Why so sudden...","sfxName":"h0133_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_18_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"You're right. It was no one's fault. Both of you tried your hardest.","sfxName":"h0025_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_18_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I know it was hard, my son.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_18_003","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Father...","sfxName":"h0133_story_024_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_19_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp1_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I...I was waiting for you to say that...","sfxName":"h0133_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_19_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp1_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Really...I've waited so long...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_19_002","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp1_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...*sob*...*sob*...*sob*...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_20_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Elio...I'm sorry. Please forgive me, I'm not worthy to be a father...","sfxName":"h0025_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_21_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Eyyyy-ya!? Wazz up, waz up? Am I interrupting you two?","sfxName":"h0010_story_007","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_21_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay, okay. I'll step out for five minutes, then come back~","sfxName":"h0010_story_027","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"No worries, come on in!","sfxName":"h0133_story_015_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, but your eyes are all red and stuff...","sfxName":"h0010_story_026","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_002","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_sp3_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"S-Some dust got rubbed in my eyes, what brings you?","sfxName":"h0133_story_014","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_003","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh ya? Tica doesn't think so. More like you were crying...I teased Annie before and she also\u2014\u2014","sfxName":"h0010_story_024","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_004","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Tica, what is it?","sfxName":"h0025_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_22_005","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, oh yeah!","sfxName":"h0010_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Actually, Li-Hwa wanted me to come here to get things moving~","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_23_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Elio coming to the Kingdom of the Sun kind of delayed the schedule. We've got to head out~","sfxName":"h0010_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_24_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"That quick? But...","sfxName":"h0025_story_010","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_24_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_embarrass_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Father, is there something on your mind?","sfxName":"h0133_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_25_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It's nothing.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_25_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm just worried you may be exhausted.","sfxName":"h0025_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Sending you two to the East Alliance to study the relationship between Qi and Runes with Li-Hwa...","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Although it was at the request of Li-Hwa, it is also for the Rune Academy.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_26_002","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"For the Rune Academy?","sfxName":"h0010_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_26_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The Dracontines have already proved there remain many enigmas concerning runes that we were unaware of.","sfxName":"h0025_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_26_004","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"If we are to protect ourselves, we need the power to contend against them.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_delight","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'm already old\u2014\u2014the future of the Rune Academy is in your hands.","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_28_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Mission received!","sfxName":"h0010_story_027","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_28_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Tica is an errand expert, not a problem at all!","sfxName":"h0010_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_28_002","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_serious_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"For the Academy...I will give it everything I have.","sfxName":"h0133_story_006","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_28_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Good answer, now get going.","sfxName":"h0025_story_015","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_29_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_embarrass_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...If I return, and I mean \"if\", Father...if you're not opposed to it...","sfxName":"h0133_story_024_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_30_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"..If I'm not opposed?","sfxName":"h0025_story_020","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_31_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_surprise_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I'd like to remain by my father's side and do research with you!","sfxName":"h0133_story_007_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_32_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_embarrass_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......M-May I?","sfxName":"h0133_story_008","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_32_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_33_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Of course! So long as that's what you really want. I've always wanted to do research with you~","sfxName":"h0025_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_34_000","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_happiness_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......Me too!","sfxName":"h0133_story_005","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_34_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_happiness_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There's still so much I want to say to you\u2014\u2014","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_34_002","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Elio, time to go~ Didn't you say when we got to the Desert Kingdom you needed to tell your friends you were safe?","sfxName":"h0010_story_018","sfxVolume":0.4},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_34_003","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Oooooh! Who would've thought I'd be the one doing the lecturing~","sfxName":"h0010_story_016","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_35_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Tell me when you return, I'll listen to it all. Time to go.","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_35_001","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_happiness_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay. Well then, I, Elio Ceres, shall take my leave, Father. I'll bring you back a bunch of souvenirs.","sfxName":"h0133_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_35_002","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Via Soul.","sfxName":"h0025_story_017","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_36_000","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Did I hear you say you wanted to buy souveniers?","sfxName":"h0010_story_019","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_36_001","SpeakerName":"Tica","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0010","IconName":"h0010s4_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Then I'll buy some Eastern spices to give to Headmaster Ceres. Maybe that'll inspire him to create a new recipe...","sfxName":"h0010_story_017","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_36_002","SpeakerName":"Elio","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0133","IconName":"h0133s5_embarrass_nh","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...For the sake of the health of all the students and teachers in the Academy, it looks like there's no way I can let you touch our funds.","sfxName":"h0133_story_014","sfxVolume":0.5},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_36_003","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"(...It's up to you two...the two children I am most proud of...)","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_37_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Indeed, just like you said.","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_37_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Everything that should be written...is nearly finished...","sfxName":"h0025_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_38_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah, now I remember.","sfxName":"h0025_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_38_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Always dragging Morris out the door to look for research materials...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_39_000","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Ah-ya, a clear and endless sky~","sfxName":"h0025_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_39_001","SpeakerName":"Charle","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0025","IconName":"h0025s5_happiness","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I must go find my good friend Morris. Let's go, Owl Boy.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_40_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Monsters and the resurrection of Sdorica are related? Is this real?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_40_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"This was intel gathered by the Rune Academy with blood and tears. I believe it is true.","sfxName":"h0021_story_036","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_41_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...I see. Well, let's assume it is true for the time being.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_01_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_41_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"May I ask if this has anything to do with why Your Majesty sent all the people away and summoned me?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_42_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"......","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_42_001","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Your Majesty?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_42_002","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Besides the Aldric family, I don't know who I can trust among the Twelve Nobles.","sfxName":"h0021_story_042","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_43_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Your Majesty, you don't suspect that among the Twelve Nobles, there are some that are working with the Dracontines...?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_43_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I don't suspect it, I firmly believe it.","sfxName":"h0021_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_43_002","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Now that I think of it, Theodore must have known. That would explain a lot of his actions when he was Regent.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_43_003","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...It's just he never let me know...","sfxName":"h0021_story_037","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_44_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Besides this, is there any more information?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_45_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"There is some concerning the inner workings of the Dracontine organization. The Academy has organized it for me. I will give it to you in due time.","sfxName":"h0021_story_036","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_45_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But before then, I'd like to ask your opinion on something.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_46_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Please, Your Majesty.","sfxName":"human_male_young_royal_01_ver2","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_46_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"The woman who charged into the Rune Academy was captured by our troops. She was brought back to the Kingdom and secretly locked up.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_46_002","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Duke Aldric, how do you think we should deal with her?","sfxName":"h0021_story_036","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_47_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I think...","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_48_000","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Angel, Master Ace. Apologies for disturbing your discussion.","sfxName":"h0018_story_027","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_48_001","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Naya? What is it?","sfxName":"h0021_story_040","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_49_000","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"It was sent from the East Alliance. An invitation to the Martial Arts Tourney.","sfxName":"h0018_story_031_ver1","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_49_001","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Before, you had left the palace, and the ambassador came many times, saying he couldn't find you.\n \nThis time, he was emphatic it be given to you directly.","sfxName":"h0018_story_021","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_50_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Oh, I'm sorry...","sfxName":"h0021_story_019","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_50_001","SpeakerName":"Naya","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0018","IconName":"h0018s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"But when you were meeting with Master Ace, it was ordered that no one is allowed to enter. I offered to take it to you on behalf of the soldier.","sfxName":"h0018_story_040","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_50_002","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_embarrass","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Okay, thank you. Let me see.","sfxName":"h0021_story_012","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_51_000","SpeakerName":"Angelia","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0021","IconName":"h0021s5_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Oh, dropped it!","sfxName":"h0021_story_013","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"main_214_007_dialog_english##_52_000","SpeakerName":"Ace","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h0179","IconName":"h0179s4_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Your Majesty, wait\u2014\u2014","sfxName":"human_male_young_soldier_11","sfxVolume":1.0}]}
